plot: As Ryan's family dynamic grows more complicated, she also finds herself in the middle of a Bat Team stand-off between Luke and Mary; Alice finds a new sidekick to do her bidding.

Ryan makes a deal with Jada to get an antidote for Mary against the Poison Ivy infection, and the deal involves betraying Marquis. Marquis doesn't take it well and escapes with the antidote. He uses the antidote to blackmail Ryan into doing something drastic. Meanwhile, Mary and Alice go on a road trip.—Gislef
